  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es produeix l'eco?</string>
            <string language="en">How do echoes happen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie geschehen Echos?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les échos se produisent-ils ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os ecos acontecem?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come gli echi accadono?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι ηχώ συμβαίνουν;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre l'origen de l'eco. Hi ha una explicació amb el càlcul de la distància mínima perquè es produeixi.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on why echoes happen. It includes an explanation and the calculation of the minimum distance for an echo to be heard.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) an, warum Echos 
geschehen. Sie schließt eine Erklärung und die Berechnung des 
minimalen Abstandes ein, damit ein Echo gehört werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) en fonction pourquoi les 
échos se produisent. Il inclut une explication et le calcul de 
la distance minimum pour qu'un écho soit entendu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) sobre porque os ecos acontecem.
Inclui uma explanação e o cálculo da distância mínima para 
que um eco seja ouvido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sopra perchè gli echi 
accadono. Include una spiegazione ed il calcolo della distanza 
minima affinchè un eco sia sentito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) επάνω γιατί οι ηχώ 
συμβαίνουν. Περιλαμβάνει μια εξήγηση και τον υπολογισμό της 
ελάχιστης απόστασης για μια ηχώ που ακούγεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
